    PwrAppModelBldr
    Build a model that can wrap an OpenPA PAModel object, but provide a consistent view with different topologies and hide devices that are out of service.
    PwrAppModelBldr.Topology  
    RATCWorker
    Remedial adaptive topology control (RATC) Evaluate power system to recommend switching actions that will alleviate flow on specified branch by calculating a set of Line Outage Distribution Factors (LODF) and applying them to the solved flows The algorithm works as follows: Fabricate and place 100MW flow across selected branch Solve flows for fabricated case Calculate fraction of flow in target branch Assign remaining fracction to network, NF LODF for each Line (branch, actually), = flow / 100 / NF
    ShiftFactorModelBuilder  
    SummaryMismatchReporter  
    SVCCalcList
    Calculate SVC injections (and B'' entry) based on bus voltage mag.
